name: Ch.7BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Eirika;What is a soldier doing sleeping in the training grounds like this?
speak;SoldierBlue;Princess!|Sorry, to have dozed off in this place!|I think it may have been because of this spear I found on the battlefield the other day.
speak;SoldierBlue;Yeah!|It looked like such a beautiful spear that I had to take it with me!|...Though I think it may be cursed...
speak;Eirika;Oh dear...|Isn't that dangerous? Why don't you just get rid of it?
speak;SoldierBlue;Because it's so strong, and you feel so revitalized after you use it!|Though, you do fall asleep right after using it though...
speak;Eirika;May be hard to use a spear that makes you sleep on the battlefield.
speak;SoldierBlue;Probably...|Here, you take it princess.|Maybe you'll find a better use of it than I can.
speak;Eirika;Ok?...|I'll see what I can do with it then.
speak;SoldierBlue;Well, that is that then!|Well, I better get back to my training!
speak;Eirika;Ok, best of luck to you.
speak;Eirika;Wow, that is one sleepy knight...
